name: Springtime Spinach Salad
author: OZAHIRU
summary: Strawberries and spinach are delicious in the Spring, and tossed with other fresh ingredients, real bacon, and hard cooked eggs, they make a wonderful salad. A sweet, tangy oil and vinegar dressing tops it off!
ingredients: 5 cups fresh spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces
½  mandarin orange, peeled and segmented
directions: Place the eggs in a saucepan with enough cold water to cover
Bring to a boil and immediately remove from heat
Cover, and let eggs stand in hot water for 12 to 15 minutes
Remove from hot water and cool
Cook the bacon in a skillet over medium high heat until crisp and evenly brown
In a large bowl, toss together the eggs, bacon, spinach, mushrooms, strawberries, onion, kiwi, and orange
In a separate bowl, mix the ketchup, water, olive oil, brown sugar, cider vinegar, and brown mustard
Season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Pour over the salad mixture, and top the salad with croutons
